SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

self.philbrown.AbLE
Interface ActivityListener

public interface ActivityListener

Classes that wish to receive callbacks for activity lifecycle events should implement this interface, then call AbLEActivity.addListener(ActivityListener) to add itself as a callback receiver.

Author:
Phil Brown

Method Summary
 void onCreate()
          This is called after the Activity has been created, or after configuration changes.
 void onDestroy()
          Called when this app is destroyed.
 void onKeyboardHidden()
          Called when the keyboard is hidden from the screen.
 void onKeyboardShown()
          Called when the keyboard is shown on screen.
 void onPause()
          Called when this app is no longer in the foreground.
 void onResume()
          This is called when the application resumes, either after a call to onStart(), or after this application has regained the foreground if, for example, another app had been opened on top.
 void onStart()
          This is called when the application is started after is was created - such as if the home button is pressed, and then the app is resumed.
 void onStop()
          Called when this app is no longer running, such as if the home button is pressed, or before the app is destroyed.
 

Method Detail

onCreate

void onCreate()
This is called after the Activity has been created, or after configuration changes.

onStart

void onStart()
This is called when the application is started after is was created - such as if the home button is pressed, and then the app is resumed.

onResume

void onResume()
This is called when the application resumes, either after a call to onStart(), or after this application has regained the foreground if, for example, another app had been opened on top.

onPause

void onPause()
Called when this app is no longer in the foreground.

onStop

void onStop()
Called when this app is no longer running, such as if the home button is pressed, or before the app is destroyed.

onDestroy

void onDestroy()
Called when this app is destroyed.

onKeyboardShown

void onKeyboardShown()
Called when the keyboard is shown on screen.

onKeyboardHidden

Called when the keyboard is hidden from the screen.
